headline.sub: Switch on Clove Additive Becomes Issue ;
headline.print_headline: Path to Tobacco Bill Includes Compromise and Criticism
headline.main: Tobacco Bill Includes Compromise and Criticism

docs.lead_paragraph: Health advocates predict that this may be the year tobacco regulation is made law, but many reject some of the bill’s provisions.
docs.snippet: Health advocates predict that this may be the year tobacco regulation is made law, but many reject some of the bill’s provisions.
